movie.title: Nanga Parbat
movie.plot: Drama about the tragic Nanga Parbat expedition by the two Messner brothers in 1970, on which Reinhold Messners younger brother Günther died.

events.title: Reinhold and Günther Messner reach the summit of Nanga Parbat
Günther Messner dies while climbing Nanga Parbat
Reinhold Messner reaches the safety of the Diamir valley
